title: G9 Homestay - Đề Thám
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at G9 Homestay - Đề Thám! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City, near Fine Arts Museum, Takashimaya Vietnam and Ben Thanh Street Food Market, G9 Homestay - Đề Thám features free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a bar.

Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.

Popular points of interest near the homestay include Tao Dan Park, Nha Rong Wharf and Ho Chi Minh City Museum. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 8 km from G9 Homestay - Đề Thám.

title: Deluxe apartment with balcony, pool, fitness and yoga
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Deluxe apartment with balcony, pool, fitness and yoga is located in Ho Chi Minh City. This recently renovated apartment is located 9.2 km from Vincom Plaza Thu Duc and 11 km from Takashimaya Vietnam. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment has a fitness room.

The apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

A minimarket is available at the apartment.

Guests at the property are welcome to use the fitness room and relax in the pool with a view. For guests with children, the apartment provides kids pool and outdoor play equipment. Guests can also relax in the garden.

Vietnam History Museum is 11 km from Deluxe apartment with balcony, pool, fitness and yoga, while Saigon Opera House is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

description:

This 2-bedroom apartment will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a living room. The accommodation is equipped with a kitchen.

Diamond Plaza is 6.6 km from the apartment, while Saigon Central Post Office is 6.7 km away. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 9 km from Sarah Homestay - Masteri Thao Dien.

description:
Apt D1 HCMC - Fully equipped luxury apt, super central location, next to Bui Vien street and Ben Thanh Market features a balcony and is located in Ho Chi Minh City, within just less than 1 km of Fine Arts Museum and a 17-minute walk of Takashimaya Vietnam. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Ho Chi Minh City Museum is 1.9 km from the apartment and Ho Chi Minh City Hall is 2.6 km away.

Leading onto a terrace with garden views, the air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom and a fully equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Ben Thanh Street Food Market, Tao Dan Park and Nha Rong Wharf. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 8 km from Apt D1 HCMC - Fully equipped luxury apt, super central location, next to Bui Vien street and Ben Thanh Market.

description:

title: Hoai Pho Hotel
description:
Situated within the Tay Ba Lo backpacker’s area, Hoai Pho Hotel is conveniently a 5-minute walk to the famous Ben Thanh Market. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire property.

Fitted with tiled flooring, air-conditioned rooms are furnished with a wardrobe, a cable TV and seating area. A small fridge and minibar are also provided for convenience. The private bathroom comes with shower and free toiletries.

Hoai Pho Hotel operates a 24-hour front desk that can assist guests with their requests. It also features a souvenir/gift shop for guests to bring home their memories. Free parking is available for motorbikes only.

Hoai Pho Hotel is just a 15-minute walk to the Reunification Palace. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is within a 30-minute drive away.

description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Acorn Saigon Hotel - Bui Vien! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. At Acorn Saigon Hotel - Bui Vien all rooms include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ben Thanh Street Food Market, Tao Dan Park and Ho Chi Minh City Museum. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 7 km from Acorn Saigon Hotel - Bui Vien, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

title: Pullman Saigon Centre
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Pullman Saigon Centre! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Pullman Saigon Centre offers modern and luxurious rooms with free Wi-Fi. Located 1 km from Ben Thanh Market, it boasts a rooftop restaurant and bar offering city views on the 31st floor and an outdoor pool on the 6th floor.

Local attractions including the Saigon River, Reunification Palace, Opera House and Notre Dame Cathedral are 1.5 km away. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 45-minute drive from Pullman Saigon Centre.

Offering city views, each air-conditioned room features a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and safe. Private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries.

Guests can work out at the hotel’s fitness centre or relax at the sauna and spa pool. Luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour reception.

The rooftop restaurant serves breakfast and has a unique circle grill concept and live show kitchen. A selection of Vietnamese beer, tea and coffee along with Eastern and Western dishes can be ordered from the lobby bar.

title: Valentine Boutique hotel - 25 Bui Vien street
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Valentine Boutique hotel - 25 Bui Vien street! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Offering modern air-conditioned rooms in Pham Ngu Lao backpackers area,Attica Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Ben Thanh Market. Free Wi-Fi and private bathrooms are available in all rooms. A daily buffet breakfast is available at its restaurant.

Warm lighting and tiled flooring feature in all room types. A flat-screen TV, minibar and personal safe are included. En suite bathrooms have a shower and hairdryer.

Attica Hotel  is a 3-minute walk from the local bus interchange of Ho Chi Minh City, where buses depart regularly for Phnom Penh, Cambodia. It is a 15-minute walk from Notre Dame Cathedral and the Reunification Palace. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

Airport transfers can be arranged at an additional charge. The hotel also provides a tour desk, business centre and a 24-hour front desk.

The hotel's restaurant serves Asian and Western dishes. In-room dining is also possible with room service. Alternatively, there are many cafes and restaurants within a 5-minute walk away.

description:

title: Cherry Hotel Central
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Cherry Hotel Central! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Situated just a 10-minute walk from the popular Ben Thanh Market, Cherry Hotel Central offers affordable rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs and free Wi-Fi. Feature free private parking, it also has a restaurant and business centre.

Cherry’s restaurant offers Western and Asian dishes in a comfortable air-conditioned environment. The bar serves light refreshments. A buffet breakfast is available daily. Room service is provided on request.

title: Acnos Hotel
description:
